participant_1.background:
I love the energy of the bar on Halloween.
I woke up one morning and found my entire house had been robbed.
My worst fear came true when my dog died last year.
i enjoy eating italian food.
I spent last year working on my fishing skills and enjoying the outdoors.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
i start an internship in engineering later this year.
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
my glasses are always dirty and i can t seem to get them clean.
i am thin.

content.text: Hey there! Where are you from?
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a pretty big deal. What about you?
I am from the Southwest, where Halloween is a big deal.
Oh cool! Do you have any Halloween traditions?
I love going to the bars on Halloween. The energy is amazing!
That sounds fun! I usually just stay in with my family and watch horror movies.
I love horror movies too! What are some of your favorites?
I love the Conjuring series! My glasses are always dirty and I can't seem to get them clean. Do you have any tips?
I usually clean mine with some Windex and a paper towel. It works pretty well!
Thanks! I'll have to try that.
No problem! So, what are you up to these days?
I'm starting an internship in engineering later this year. I'm really excited about it!
That's awesome! Congrats!
Thanks! I'm looking forward to learning a lot.
I'm sure you will!
Me too!
Sounds like you have a lot going on!
Yeah, I'm pretty busy but I'm happy about it!
That's great!
Thanks
